rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究将历史教育政策与晚年更好的认知结果联系起来罗格斯大学健康研究人员领导的一项研究表明，影响受教育程度的历史政策对以后的生活记忆和痴呆风险具有持久的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-links-historical-education-policies-to-better-cognitive-outcomes-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-links-historical-education-policies-to-better-cognitive-outcomes-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ef7d312-06e8-421f-b12f-58d2727859d8 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 00:46:31 -0500 Study links historical education policies to better cognitive outcomes later in life
研究人员寻求开发慢性疲劳综合症的无创诊断方法慢性疲劳综合症 (CFS) 是一种复杂且长期的疾病，其特征是极度疲劳，这种症状不会因休息而改善，而且会因体力活动而恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Researchers-seek-to-develop-nonpressive-diagnostics-for-chronic-fatigue-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Researchers-seek-to-develop-nonpressive-diagnostics-for-chronic-fatigue-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b5ece68-e1ea-47d7-8e2d-5f9cc2b8e2dc Thu, 21 Nov 2024 00:42:52 -0500 Researchers seek to develop noninvasive diagnostics for chronic fatigue syndrome
替曲帕肽可降低肥胖相关心力衰竭患者的死亡或心力衰竭恶化风险UVA Health 的最新研究表明，减肥和糖尿病药物替泽帕肽可以降低心力衰竭、保留心泵功能和肥胖患者的死亡或心力衰竭恶化的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Titrzepatide-reduces-risk-of-death-or-worsening-heart-failure-for-病人-with-obesity-lated-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Titrzepatide-reduces-risk-of-death-or-worsening-heart-failure-for-病人-with-obesity-lated-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dc444e3-e031-4d96-9e41-081e7323a8d6 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 00:37:52 -0500 Titrzepatide reduces risk of death or worsening heart failure for patients with obesity-related heart failure
纳米颗粒涂层增强癌症药物输送并减少副作用根据密西西比大学最近的研究，一勺糖实际上可能有助于药物的吸收。它可以减少癌症治疗的有害副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Nanoarticle-coating-enhances-cancer-drug-delivery-and-reduces-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Nanoarticle-coating-enhances-cancer-drug-delivery-and-reduces-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1457c3ab-38b2-489e-aba3-84cf4dc747e0 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 00:18:52 -0500 Nanoparticle coating enhances cancer drug delivery and reduces side effects
几十年来早产与死亡风险增加有关根据维克森林大学医学院和多伦多病童医院 (SickKids) 研究人员的一项新研究，早产与从出生到 30 岁和 40 岁的死亡风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Preterm-birth-linked-to-increased-mortality-risk-across-decades.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Preterm-birth-linked-to-increased-mortality-risk-across-decades.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79693d74-7927-4a00-bed8-30f26fbdfa9e Thu, 21 Nov 2024 00:03:52 -0500 Preterm birth linked to increased mortality risk across decades
正常乳腺组织细胞含有癌症样遗传异常德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心研究人员的一项新研究发现，在健康女性中，一些看似正常的乳腺细胞可能含有通常与浸润性乳腺癌相关的染色体异常。这些发现质疑了关于乳腺癌遗传起源的传统思维，这可能会影响早期癌症检测方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Normal-breast-tissue-cells-harbor-cancer-like-genic-abnormalities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Normal-breast-tissue-cells-harbor-cancer-like-genic-abnormalities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c32a4f2-3494-4110-a11b-f135954d897f Wed, 20 Nov 2024 23:54:34 -0500 Normal breast tissue cells harbor cancer-like genetic abnormalities
电刺激迷走神经可以对抗炎症性肠病杜克大学医学院的研究人员发现，利用神经系统有助于减少导致炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的肠道炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Electrical-stimulation-of-vagus-nerve-could-combat-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Electrical-stimulation-of-vagus-nerve-could-combat-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb17b0b9-25ba-457f-9cf3-da61df9b8768 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 23:49:45 -0500 Electrical stimulation of vagus nerve could combat inflammatory bowel disease
下颌肌肉大小与老年人肌少症风险相关随着人口老龄化，肌肉减少症（肌肉质量和功能逐渐丧失）的流行已成为日益紧迫的公共卫生问题。肌肉减少症会增加跌倒和虚弱的风险，降低老年人的生活质量，并增加需要长期护理的可能性。因此，预防肌肉减少症对于减轻这种医疗负担至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Jaw-muscle-size-linked-to-sarcopenia-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Jaw-muscle-size-linked-to-sarcopenia-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=742167f9-d770-4b86-a52f-62c5e653a5c0 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 23:41:57 -0500 Jaw muscle size linked to sarcopenia risk in older adults
重新思考乳制品：全脂牛奶与更健康的体重有关全脂牛奶摄入量与美国成年人较低的体重、BMI 和肥胖风险相关。这项研究挑战了传统的低脂乳制品指南，并强调了全脂牛奶在健康体重管理中的潜在作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Rethinking-dairy-Whole-milk-tied-to-healthier-weight-profiles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Rethinking-dairy-Whole-milk-tied-to-healthier-weight-profiles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f89fefd-66bb-446d-a3a1-2ada4bcb1ee2 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 23:40:00 -0500 Rethinking dairy: Whole milk tied to healthier weight profiles
研究人员发现与 DCIS 进展相关的关键基因一组研究人员绘制了导管原位癌（DCIS）的分子图谱，在区分乳腺癌早期癌前病变是否会发展为侵袭性癌症或保持稳定方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Researchers-uncover-key-genes-linked-to-DCIS-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Researchers-uncover-key-genes-linked-to-DCIS-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0a2344e-55d2-431d-a8b8-23c8553c6423 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 23:32:14 -0500 Researchers uncover key genes linked to DCIS progression
